      • addVariableTable

        public void addVariableTable​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​Variable> table)
        add a new symbol table of the current scope
        Parameters:
        table - variable symbol table

      • removeBlockTable

        public void removeBlockTable()
        remove the last variable table (of last scope)

      • variableScope

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​Variable> variableScope​(java.lang.String name)
        find the most inner scope the variable is declared in
        Parameters:
        name - variable name to search
        Returns:
        A variable table if found, else null

      • defineVariable

        public void defineVariable​(java.lang.String name,
                           java.lang.String constant,
                           java.lang.String type,
                           java.lang.String value)
                    throws VerifierExceptions
        Defines a variable with the given details, that is, adds it to the suitable scope table, if it is a valid variable.
        Parameters:
        name - variable's name
        constant - final variable or not
        type - variable's type
        value - variable's value
        Throws:
        VerifierExceptions - illegal variable

      • defineMethod

        public void defineMethod​(Block blockSignature,
                         int line)
                  throws VerifierExceptions
        defines a new method in the global scope (adds it to methods symbol table)
        Parameters:
        blockSignature - method signature
        line - the line the methods starts at
        Throws:
        VerifierExceptions - illegal method signature.

      • checkVarCompatibility

        public void checkVarCompatibility​(java.lang.String type,
                                  java.lang.String value)
                           throws VerifierExceptions
        check if the a variable of the given type compatible a given value
        Parameters:
        type - type of variable
        value - a given value (may be a name ot other variable)
        Throws:
        VerifierExceptions - illegal variable

      • isCompatibleTypes

        public boolean isCompatibleTypes​(java.lang.String type1,
                                 java.lang.String type2)
        check if the given types ar compatible.
        Parameters:
        type1 - first type
        type2 - second type
        Returns:
        true if compatible, false else.
